metadata.name: Renamed MegaSync Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of a renamed MegaSync.exe as seen used by ransomware families like Nefilim, Sodinokibi, Pysa, and Conti.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('megasync.exe') AND NOT endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\megasync.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of a renamed MegaSync.exe as seen used by ransomware families like Nefilim, Sodinokibi, Pysa, and Conti.

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Software that illegally integrates MegaSync in a renamed form 2. Administrators that have renamed MegaSync Reference: https://redcanary.com/blog/rclone-mega-extortion/
